products.name: Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith

characterabilities.name: Brace For Impact
characterabilities.description: This model is not moved when slammed.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed.

feat.name: Bastion Of Faith
feat.description: While in Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith's control range, warjacks in his battlegroup gain +4 ARM and Brace for Impact. When a friendly Faction warrior model in Durst's control range is directly hit by an attack while within 2" of a warjack in Durst's battlegroup, you can choose to have the warjack be directly hit instead. The warjack is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects from the attack. Bastion of Faith lasts for one round.

execution.name: Stone-and-Mortar Stance
execution.description: During its activation, this model can forfeit its Normal Movement or Combat Action to gain +5 ARM. The affected model cannot become knocked down. Stone-and-Mortar Stance lasts for one round.

ability.name: Eruption Of Ash
ability.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Defender's Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Hallowed Avenger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Cohort model gains Righteous Vengeance. (If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of a model with Righteous Vengeance during the last round, during your Maintenance Phase the model with Righteous Vengeance can advance up to 3" and make one basic attack.).

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Protectorate]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Protectorate model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Protectorate Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Protectorate units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Protectorate Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Flameguard]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Flameguard models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Whip the Flames
characterabilities.description: Models suffering the Fire continuous effect while in this model's control range suffer -2 to accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Scorched Earth
feat.description: Enemy models currently in Feora's control range suffer the Continuous Fire effect. Friendly warjack models can charge or power attack slam enemy models suffering the Continuous Fire effect without spending a focus point. Scorched Earth lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Ashen Veil
execution.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

spells.name: Dauntless Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +3 ARM and Tough.

spells.name: Engine Of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Fire Step
spells.description: Enemy models currently within 2" of the spellcaster suffer a POW 13 fire damage roll. After the damage is resolved, place the spellcaster completely within 2" of its current location. Fire Step can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Hex Hammer
spells.description: When an enemy model declares it is casting a spell while in this model's Control Range, the enemy spellcaster immediately suffers d3 damage points. If the enemy spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect. Hex Hammer lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Incite
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to attack and damage rolls against enemy models while the enemy models are in the spellcaster's command range. Incite lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Caustic Presence [Fire]

characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Protectorate model. characterabilities.name: Righteous Flames

feat.name: Wildfire
feat.description: Feora gains 1 focus point for each enemy model currently in her control range suffering the Continuous Fire effect and can immediately give that focus to warjacks in her battlegroup that are in her control range. Feora can then remove the Continuous Fire effect from any number of models in her control range. For each Continuous Fire effect Feora removes, choose one model in her control range to suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, place one anger token on this model. This model gains +1 to melee damage rolls for each anger token on it. Additionally, while this model has five or more anger tokens, it gains +2 AAT and ARC.

spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". spells.name: Scorn
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, Feora gains one anger token.

characterabilities.description: When included in a Trollbloods army, this model is a Trollbloods model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Reconnaissance (Action)
characterabilities.description: Choose one enemy model or unit with ambush that has not yet been put into play. Its controller must immediately deploy the chosen model or unit. This ability can only be used once per game.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Prey]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Prey. (After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. A model with Prey gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.)

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Take Down]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Take Down. (Models disabled by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.)

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

ability.name: Batter
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's activation, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1 directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1 directly toward it.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

characterabilities.name: Order: Bushwhack
characterabilities.description: During this unit's activation, affected models make their Combat Action before their Normal Movement. Affected models must make a full advance as their Normal Movement this activation.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Protectorate of Menoth]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Protectorate of Menoth army, this model is a Protectorate of Menoth model instead of a Mercenary model.

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Llael]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Llael army, this model is a Llael model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Quick Work
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Vendetta [Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on all accuracy and damage rolls against Khador.

ability.name: Both Barrels (Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:.

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Ghost Shot
subabilities.description: This model ignores LOS, Concealment, and cover when making attacks with this weapon.

subabilities.name: Heart Seeker
subabilities.description: Gain an additional die on damage rolls resulting from this attack. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Idrian Skirmishers]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Idrian Skirmishers unit.

characterabilities.name: Go to Ground
characterabilities.description: This model can use Go to Ground once per game at any time while in formation during its unit's activation. For one round or until they move, are placed, or are engaged, models in this unit that are currently in formation gain cover and Resistance: Blast, and do not block LOS.

characterabilities.name: Order: Slip Away
characterabilities.description: Affected models must use their Normal Movement to make a full advance this activation. During this advance, affected models cannot be targeted by free strikes and can move through other models if they have enough movement to get move completely past them.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Protectorate of Menoth]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Protectorate of Menoth army, this model is a Protectorate of Menoth model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

ability.name: Combo Strike (Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

models.name: Guide
models.title: Mercenary Unit Command Attachment [Idrian Skirmishers Unit]

characterabilities.name: Granted [Prey]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Prey. (After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. A model with Prey gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.)

characterabilities.name: Granted [Prowl]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Prowl. (While a model with Prowl has concealment, it gains Stealth.)

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Intrigue
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target enemy warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it loses Stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Parley (Action)
characterabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy warrior models cannot cannot target this model or its warcaster/warlock with attacks. Parlay lasts one round.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Ord]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, this model is a Ord model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Seduction (Action)
characterabilities.description: Take control of a living enemy non-leader model. If the model is in range you can immediately make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a basic melee attack, then Seduction expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. A model can be affected by Seduction only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Sucker!
characterabilities.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Assist
characterabilities.description: If its leader is in this model's CMD range during your Control Phase, the leader can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury/essence.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Secrets (Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target this model's warcaster. If the warcaster is in range, it gains an additional die on magic attack rolls and magic damage rolls for the next spell it casts. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Arcane Secrets lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Ios]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ios army, this model is a Ios model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Spiritual Conduit
characterabilities.description: While its Leader is in this model's command range, when the Leader casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +2 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy ranged attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12 total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12 during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5 of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2 of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2 of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8 beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1 of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
